title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 257.15 - Expedited rendition of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 257.15 - Expedited rendition of award

State Regulations
(a) Should the parties mutually agree to an
expedited rendition of the arbitrator's award, notice in the form of a joint
request in writing shall be received by the director of conciliation before the
designation of the arbitrator. (b) The decision of the arbitrator shall be in the form of an award only, and shall
be rendered within seven days after the arbitrator has declared the hearing
closed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
257.15

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
